job description:
Security Data Analyst#CO 7486 Please send resume to ...@makecor.com or call 630-###-#### and ask for CHELSEY. Location: CHICAGO, ILDuration: 3 Months+ Description:Data Entry resource responsible for providing technical expertise in development and support of all activities, processes, and tools for protecting technology based information.Assist in the provisioning of security structures to support the data security needs of access controls requested. Ideal candidate profile:Conscientious and detail oriented when performing data entryHands on experience in identity management operations.Exposure to one or more of the following: Microsoft Active Directory, Novell eDirectory, CA Top Secret, Siebel, Microsoft SQL, Custom web based GUIsKnowledge of role-based access controls, e.g. RBAC, IAM, etc. is helpfulExcellent verbal communication skills.Understanding of IT Provisioning and RSA Tokens is preferredMainframe environment expense helpful but not required John PottebaumQuality Manager - provided by Dice AD Mainframe, RSA Tokens, IT Provisioning
Associated topics: finance, financial, financial advisor, financial professional, investment, investment analyst, payment, personal banker, risk management, treasury
